verb.description: Think about (a fact, proposal, or request) deeply and at length.
examples: she began to mull over the various possibilities
the government is mulling an overhaul of outdated insurance laws
synonyms: consider the pros and cons of

proper noun.description: A large island of the Inner Hebrides; chief town, Tobermory.

origin: Late 17th century: abbreviation, from Hindi malmal.
